item.title: [c21] Great Furnace
item.description:
Artifact Land

{T}: Add {R}.

item.title: [c21] Darksteel Citadel
item.description:
Artifact Land

Indestructible

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [c21] Ancient Den
item.description:
Artifact Land

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [c21] Ichor Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Feldon of the Third Path
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

{2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [c21] Daretti, Scrap Savant
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Daretti

+2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

−2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

−10: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step."

Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

item.title: [c21] Bosh, Iron Golem
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Golem

Trample

{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to any target.

item.title: [c21] Thousand-Year Elixir
item.description:
Artifact

You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though those creatures had haste.

{1}, {T}: Untap target creature.

item.title: [c21] Steel Overseer
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

item.title: [c21] Myr Battlesphere
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Construct

When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

item.title: [c21] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Meteor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

item.title: [c21] Duplicant
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Shapeshifter

Imprint — When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.

As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

item.title: [c21] Combustible Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

First strike

When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards.

item.title: [c21] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [c21] Sculpting Steel
item.description:
Artifact

You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Hedron Archive
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

item.title: [c21] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [stx] Tempted by the Oriq
item.description:
Sorcery

For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls with mana value 3 or less.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TvNxaEtpxF4

item.title: [stx] Ingenious Mastery
item.description:
Sorcery

You may pay {2}{U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

If the {2}{U} cost was paid, you draw three cards, then an opponent creates two Treasure tokens and they scry 2. If that cost wasn't paid, you draw X cards.

item.title: [stx] Sedgemoor Witch
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

Menace

Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/bog-times-witherbloom-college-2021-04-02

item.title: [stx] Oriq Loremage
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

{T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put a +1/+1 counter on Oriq Loremage.

item.title: [stx] Callous Bloodmage
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

When Callous Bloodmage enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Exile target player's graveyard.

https://twitter.com/day9tv/status/1377999269769187328

item.title: [stx] Blex, Vexing Pest // Search for Blex
item.description: Legendary Creature — Pest // Sorcery

item.title: [stx] Accomplished Alchemist
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6pKUACYV7s

item.title: [stx] Culling Ritual
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

item.title: [stx] Rushed Rebirth
item.description:
Instant

Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [stx] Daemogoth Titan
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Whenever Daemogoth Titan attacks or blocks, sacrifice a creature.

https://www.reddit.com/r/MagicArena/comments/mijvpn/stx_daemogoth_titan_containment_breach/

item.title: [stx] The Biblioplex
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it into your graveyard. Activate only if you have exactly zero or seven cards in hand.

https://multiplayer.it/articoli/magic-the-gathering-strixhaven-quattro-carte-in-esclusiva.html

item.title: [stx] Mortality Spear
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if you gained life this turn.

Destroy target nonland permanent.

item.title: [c21] Alibou, Ancient Witness
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Golem

Other artifact creatures you control have haste.

Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Alibou, Ancient Witness deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipS8qV-qiCU

item.title: [c21] Losheel, Clockwork Scholar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Artificer

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking artifact creatures you control.

Whenever one or more artifact creatures enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipS8qV-qiCU

item.title: [c21] Laelia, the Blade Reforged
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Warrior

Haste

Whenever Laelia, the Blade Reforged attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

Whenever you exile one or more cards from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipS8qV-qiCU

item.title: [stx] Flamescroll Celebrant // Revel in Silence
item.description: Creature — Human Shaman // Instant

item.title: [stx] Selfless Glyphweaver // Deadly Vanity
item.description: Creature — Human Cleric // Sorcery

item.title: [stx] Elite Spellbinder
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Flying

When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

https://twitter.com/PVDDR/status/1376318085817372674

item.title: [stx] Mavinda, Students' Advocate
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Bird Advisor

Flying

{0}: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell doesn't target a creature you control, it costs {8} more to cast this way. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Activate only once each turn. (You still pay the spell's costs. Timing rules for the spell still apply.)

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/971754838

item.title: [stx] Strict Proctor
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

Whenever a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability to trigger, counter that ability unless its controller pays {2}.

item.title: [stx] Sparring Regimen
item.description:
Enchantment

When Sparring Regimen enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature and untap it.

item.title: [stx] Retriever Phoenix
item.description:
Creature — Phoenix

Flying, haste

When Retriever Phoenix enters the battlefield, if you cast it, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

As long as Retriever Phoenix is in your graveyard, if you would learn, you may instead return Retriever Phoenix to the battlefield.

item.title: [stx] Illuminate History
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

item.title: [stx] Gnarled Professor
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Druid

Trample

When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

item.title: [stx] Basic Conjuration
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.

item.title: [stx] Velomachus Lorehold
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying, vigilance, haste

Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [stx] Dramatic Finale
item.description:
Enchantment

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [stx] Double Major
item.description:
Instant

Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)

item.title: [stx] Elemental Expressionist
item.description:
Creature — Orc Wizard

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When you exile this creature, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

item.title: [stx] Harness Infinity
item.description:
Instant

Exchange your hand and graveyard.

Exile Harness Infinity.

item.title: [stx] Hofri Ghostforge
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your graveyard."

item.title: [stx] Radiant Scrollwielder
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Cleric

Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
